revised_title: Measuring Actinic Erythema and its Latent Time in Ultra-Violet Radiation
tldr: This study investigates the measurement of actinic erythema produced by ultra-violet radiation, focusing on the latent time before the first visible signs of erythema appear. The research provides a method for accurately estimating the effect of ultra-violet radiation on the skin, which can help in understanding skin health and the biological action of radiation.
